knimeNode.name: Envelope Function
knimeNode.shortDescription: Calculates the envelope function for another function.

intro.p: This node takes an input table with a numeric input column. It calculates the envelope curve for that input column and returns a new table containing one column with the envelope curve.

fullDescription.option: Choose the input column containing the input function.

ports.inPort: A table with at least one double compatible column serving as the input signal.
ports.outPort: The output table containing the smoothed signal either by replacing the input column or appended as a new column.
